Sentencas: Perovskite type ceramic membranes which exhibit dual ion conduction (proton and oxygen ion conduction) can permeate water and can aid solving operational problems such as temperature gradient and carbon deposition associated with a working solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: The Role of Metal Catalyst on Water Permeation and Stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: From this point of view, it is crucial to reveal water transport mechanism and especially the nature of the surface sites that is necessary for water incorporation and evolution.
Titulo: The Role of Metal Catalyst on Water Permeation and Stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-alpha (BCY20) was used as a model proton and oxygen ion conducting membrane in this work.
Titulo: The Role of Metal Catalyst on Water Permeation and Stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: Four different catalytically modified membrane configurations were used for the investigations and water flux was measured as a function of temperature.
Titulo: The Role of Metal Catalyst on Water Permeation and Stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: In addition, CO was introduced to the permeate side in order to test the stability of membrane against water and CO/CO2 and post operation analysis of used membranes were carried out.
Titulo: The Role of Metal Catalyst on Water Permeation and Stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: The results revealed that water incorporation occurs on any exposed electrolyte surface.
Titulo: The Role of Metal Catalyst on Water Permeation and Stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: However, the magnitude of water permeation changes depending on which membrane surface is catalytically modified.
Titulo: The Role of Metal Catalyst on Water Permeation and Stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: The platinum increases the water flux on the feed side whilst it decreases the flux on the permeate side.
Titulo: The Role of Metal Catalyst on Water Permeation and Stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: Water flux measurements suggest that platinum can block water permeation on the permeate side by reducing the access to the lattice oxygen in the surface layer.
Titulo: The Role of Metal Catalyst on Water Permeation and Stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ
